name: Gastrodon
flavorText:
It has a pliable body without any
bones. If any part of its body is
torn off, it grows right back.
formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined before a wild encounter based on whether the battle is in western or eastern Sinnoh and cannot be changed.

previous.name: Shellos
previous.flavorText:
Its colors and shapes differ from
region to region. In the Sinnoh
region, two types are confirmed.
previous.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined before a wild encounter based on whether the battle is in western or eastern Sinnoh, or inherited from the mother when breeding, and cannot be changed.

next.name: Ambipom
next.flavorText:
To eat, it deftly shucks nuts
with its two tails. It rarely uses
its arms now.

pokemon.name: Shellos
pokemon.flavorText:
Its colors and shapes differ from
region to region. In the Sinnoh
region, two types are confirmed.
pokemon.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined before a wild encounter based on whether the battle is in western or eastern Sinnoh, or inherited from the mother when breeding, and cannot be changed.
